title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 375.2 - Employee benefits only to be evaluated
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 375.2 - Employee benefits only to be evaluated

State Regulations

It is required by law that benefits payable to employees
under a plan shall be "at least as favorable" as the employee disability
benefits provided by law, and dependent benefits are, therefore, excess
benefits not evaluated under this Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
375.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
